column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We liked this place so much we went twice this past week. Delicious warm sourdough bread served with perfectly spreadable sweet butter is placed on the table soon after you are seated. The steaks are perfectly prepared
column2: flavorful-no sauce required. The side dishes are stellar
column4: charred  brusselsprouts and the sautéed mushrooms. And don't miss the shrimp cold platter-fresh
column5: sweet with a dollop of the horseradish infused home made cocktail sauce. Servings are huge
column6: so sharing family style is the best option.
